snippet: The deficit rose 7.6 percent to $43 billion in September, the first increase in four months. Exports fell 1.5 percent to $195.6 billion.
lead_paragraph: The deficit rose 7.6 percent to $43 billion in September, the first increase in four months. Exports fell 1.5 percent to $195.6 billion.

headline.main: U.S. Trade Deficit Rose in September on Weakened Global Demand
headline.print_headline: US trade deficit expands in September
